page.title: Tech Stocks Edge Higher, Lifted by Dell
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Stocks rose slightly on Friday, boosted by computer maker Dell Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DELL.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DELL.O</A>, but gains were small as Wall Street took a breather after Thursday's rally.
